Text:
They are NOT pulling a New 52! They are ending some titles and starting some new titles. Check here to see if your favorite is ending and get a peek at some of the new titles.

Wolverine & the X-Men IS continuing - That's all I really cared about :D
lol yeah this will be interesting, where did you get this?
I just started reading Wolverine and the X-men, and I love it!

@plattekak:

Its great, there are a few issues during AvX where is goes off track, but this last issue makes it look like theyre going back to their own stories. I was worried that it would be canceled.
Thanks for this.  Do you happen to have the recently released Goon #40 and Prophet #27 that you can upload?
definately picking up mark waid's take on the hulk. he's done a hellofajob with DareDevil, which also won't be discontinued.
